title: Cant find mystery skin:(
body:
I was gifted with a mystery skin gift from Riot but I closed the box too fast. I thought another box / window was going to open to show the gift. I looked through all of my champions and didn't see anything new and went to the Gift History and it didn't show anything either.
Is there a way I can find out? I also already tried to contact Riot but they haven't responded.

replies.body: The toast you received was for the icon, and your account hasn't received a mystery skin yet.  Per our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-), gifts are still rolling out and will take some time to process.  Hang tight!
I guess that was riot kayle...
Go to purchase history then go to gifting history and that should tell you what you got.
